ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Faction hit
ygData.msgSnippet: I hope you are still around to read this thread . . . I was in Erudin over the weekend, heading to the library to get some songs when I saw something that
ygData.messageBody:
I hope you are still around to read this thread . . .
I was in Erudin over the weekend, heading to the library to get some songs
when I saw something that caught my eye. A sign on the Paladin guild that
says, "Deepwater Knights. Followers of Prexuz". It was spelled with a "z"
not an "s". It is possible that you MAY be taking a faction hit against
them *shrugs*. I know if you kill the fish in the paladin/cleric pool in
Qeynos you take a faction hit against their god Rodcet Nife. This does
make you KoS with the paladins and clerics in Qeynos. All I can say is
zone in to Erudin, con some paladins and leave.


At 09:25 AM 3/14/00 -0300, you wrote:
>From: Ericka <andre.junqueira@...>
>
>Hello there guys =)
>
>I have been soloing NPCs from Kerra Island (the Catman people) for a while.
>They are really, really good exp at 18th lvl, not hard to solo, non
>carters, some of them spanw alone, fast spanw rate (no more than 5minutes)
>and a decent loot (around 4gp plus a skin worth 2gp). Then while I heal up,
>I kill willowisps to get a couple GLS.
>The only point that has been tricking me is about the faction hit...
>I have been getting a bad faction hit with "Prexuz". That made me wonder...
>Who is Prexuz? (note that Prexus, the Ocean Lord, is spelled with "s",
>while the faction hits PrexuZ).
>If anyone knows anything about this plz let me know
>
>
>Ericka, the sexyest bardess on Prexus.
>
>
